game

Class Creep

  • java.lang.Object
    • structure.StructureObject
      • game.GameObject
        • game.VisibleObject
          • game.Actor
            • game.Alive
              • game.Creep
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AcceptsInput

    public class Creep
extends Alive
    The Creep object is a special type of alive that is meant to behave like a mindless monster or "creep" that simply follows a set of directions.
    Since:
    Pre-A
    Author:
    Spartak
